name: Winter Veil Cookie
tooltip:
Winter Veil Cookie
Item Level 55
Binds when picked up
Use: Restores 2% of your health per second for 24 sec.  Must remain seated while eating.  If you spend at least 10 seconds eating you will become well fed and gain Stamina and Spirit for 15 min.
"Fresh from the oven"
Max Stack: 5
